docs.snippet: Of late, the mayor and his team have taken to dialing up well-known personages and asking: Would you, could you, might you run for mayor?...
docs.lead_paragraph: Of late, the mayor and his team have taken to dialing up well-known personages and asking: Would you, could you, might you run for mayor?
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column contends that Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's heavily leaked executive search for a successor is, at best, poor political form.

headline.seo: As Clock Ticks, Michael R. Bloomberg Is Still Seeking a Worthy Heir
headline.main: As Clock Ticks, Bloomberg Is Still Seeking a Worthy Heir
headline.print_headline: As Clock Ticks, Bloomberg Is Still Seeking A Worthy Heir

docs.snippet: Colleagues and readers have nominated another crop of words and phrases that seem to appear with numbing regularity in our prose. Some are unavoidable on occasion, and none deserve to be banned outright. But take this as an invitation to look for ...
docs.abstract: Colleagues and readers have nominated another crop of words and phrases that seem to appear with numbing regularity in our prose. Some are unavoidable on occasion, and none deserve to be banned outright. But take this as an invitation to look for fresher alternatives.
